overview: Chandrasekhar (Sarath Babu) disowns his daughter Divya (Sneha) when she goes against his wishes and marries Surya (Srikanth). She later dies after accidentally falling off of the roof of her house. Before dying, Divya makes a final wish to her husband of having her son brought up by her father. Surya then does his best to fulfill her final wish.  Drama/Family movie  Supporting Actor(s): Dharmavarapu Subramanyam, Krishna Bhagavan, M S Narayana, Ramaprabha, Sarath Babu  Music: Srikanth Deva  Director(s): E Satti Babu  Language: Telugu
title: Evandoi Sreevaru
